data.title: Horicon, Wisconsin Population 2024
data.text:
Horicon is a city located in Dodge County Wisconsin. Horicon has a 2024 population of 3,767. Horicon is currently declining at a rate of -0.16% annually and its population has decreased by -0.58% since the most recent census, which recorded a population of 3,789 in 2020.

The average household income in Horicon is $60,718 with a poverty rate of 13.64% . The median age in Horicon is 38.8 years: 34.6 years for males, and 41.9 years for females.

Horicon Demographics

According to the most recent ACS, the racial composition of Horicon was:

White : 97.13%

Black or African American : 2.06%

Two or more races : 0.34%

Native American : 0.24%

Other race : 0.24%

Asian : 0%

Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander : 0%
